page.title: 17FOOTBALL MATCH VIOLENCE
page.content: { In recent months, lots of people have got killed at football matches, like the one at Bradford City ground,where there was a fire. It was probably caused by a cigarette being put in a cup,which was knocked over into some newspapers catching them alight. Soon the whole stand was alight. Policemen were throwing people onto the grass who were on fire. In Brussels, many people were killed because of trouble between the fans of Juventus and Liverpool,who caused a wall to collapse on top of the fans.Ambulance people took a long time to get there. Mrs. Thatcher said no alcholic drinks were to be allowed into the stadiums and English teams have been banned from playing abroad,because of the trouble the fans cause. It is sad that our football teams cannot play in other countries because of their fans.
